data.text:
@VPrasadMDMPH This.  Couldn't have been stated in a better way.  The sheer amount of BS and lies are unbelievable for the past two years.

https://t.co/wVezlfqYk2
@subsix848 @VPrasadMDMPH I#the cdc says that 1 out of 4 cases reported. 78 mil cases so wouldn’t that mean 3 times that was not reported, 240 mil?
@VPrasadMDMPH I hope no one is taking your bullshit seriously.

@VPrasadMDMPH Also where are the studies on hospitalizations due to (not with) Covid & icu for kids who’ve been infected with delta & omicron comparing kids who had prior infection vs did not? Also enough infections in Dec/jan, could have studied vax vs prior infection vs neither

@VPrasadMDMPH Hey journalists, what is the matter that no one has dared to investigate FDA actions and COVAXIN’s application for ages 2-18 collecting dust at FDA? @NYTScience @nytimes @nypost @ScienceNews @sciam  @washingtonpost @NYTHealth @FoxNews @WSJhealth @US_FDA @FDASpox @FDACBER @Ocugen
@ChrisGableDO @VPrasadMDMPH Yes. Do use this logic for other diseases (processes?). Tell me how many schools were closed for other diseases?
@OvrTd_scientist @VPrasadMDMPH So how well did those mitigations work?
